author: KarolWes
title: Beautiful hideout
review:
I'm not a big fan of LEGO Friends, but I must admit, that this set is great.

Model
Main building in this set is a tree house. Model looks beautiful. It is very refined. I don't like its coloring - it is too colorful for me. Tree trunk is based on small rock piece in brown. Inside the trunk is small room to store some equipment. In front of tree is nicely decorated sign 'keep out' (sticker). Second floor is main house. From the front there is a balcony with ladder to climb to house. Door has great lock (printed). Inside there is one room with some posters or photos, bed and two tables. There is also second entrance, which leads to big net thing at the side. There is also a clip to attach something they need in house. At the attic is very little space, but enough to put one box. Roof can be opened to easier take out the container. There is also a flag with Mia's symbol on it (sticker) and a bird nest with egg and bird. Around whole second floor are attached leaves and branches.

To the roof is also attached long rubber string, on which there is some kind of ropeslide. Second end is placed on small side build with some flowers and target sign (printed). This feature works pretty well, minidolls can slide from house to the ground quite smoothly.

Last side build is kind of rabbit house with carrot field, short stonelike road and tiny house build basing on 1x4x2 arch brick. This looks quite cute, but is totally unnecessary. 
Minidolls in this set has enormous quantity of equipment. We get scissors, water gun (stud shooter), book (sticker on cover, printed tile inside), boomerang (who knows what for) ball and many more.

Minidolls
Mia - One of main Friends characters, looks great. She had fantastic checked sleeveless shirt, lightning necklace, and three quarter long trousers. On her foot she have pair of nice trainers. On her face she have some freckles and big green eyes. Hair are the same since beginning. Overall looks nice.
Daniel - He appeared before in one set in 2016. He's wearing dark green jacket, withe shirt underneath, jeans and great boots. He has spike hair, freckles, brown eyes and super smile.

Parts
There aren't many super useful parts, just handful of typical ones. They exist in many nontypical colors (lavender, medium lilac). Also worth noticed is big amount of printed pieces.

Summary

  • Tree house looks fantastic
  • Interior is simple but works pretty well
  • Ropeslide is nice touch
  • Rabbit house is unnecessary
  • Minidolls looks ok, but are useless when someone has few Friends sets.
  • Many printed parts
  • Weird colors
